alias.info.description: Alias is used to replace the original text of property values in UI, such as translations, etc.
alias.confirm.mergeDescription: All selected alias groups will be merged into one, and the final preferred is {{preferred}}, are you sure?
alias.confirm.deleteDescription: All selected alias groups and its candidates will be delete and there is no way back, are you sure?
alias.confirm.noWayBack: There is no way back, are you sure?
alias.tip.preferredText: {{text}} will be the preferred text in merged groups, you can change the preferred text by clicking the text.
